attributes.action: actually answer a question in Prime Ministers questions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im fed up with the Gordon Brown not answering questions in Prime ministers question time,rather than answer he goes into one of his long boring speeches blah blah blah.iwont this changed if somebody asks a question bloody well answer it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
